sentences.en: A general amnesty for political prisoners may be in the offing.
sentences.cn: 可能即将对政治犯实行大赦。

sentences.en: Activists who were involved in crimes of violence will not automatically be granted amnesty.
sentences.cn: 参与暴力犯罪的激进分子将不会自动得到赦免。
总之,一场赦免将意味着大变革.

sentences.en: In addition to these practical difficulties, amnesty is a bad approach conceptually.
sentences.cn: 除了这些很现实的困难,从对观念的影响来看, 搞特赦也并非良策.

sentences.en: In exchange for his services , Odumin gave Gallandro general amnesty.
sentences.cn: 作为回报,奥杜明特赦了加兰德罗.

sentences.en: Order was restored and the king granted amnesty to those who had plotted against him.
sentences.cn: 秩序已恢复,国王大赦曾阴谋反抗他的人.

sentences.en: Some political criminals were favoured with amnesty.
sentences.cn: 有几个政治犯受到特赦.

sentences.en: The exiles returned home under an amnesty.
sentences.cn: 流放的政治犯“根据”大赦令回到家园.

sentences.en: The government granted an amnesty to all political prisoner.
sentences.cn: 所有政治犯被给予大赦.

sentences.en: The king decreed a general amnesty.
The King will proclaim an amnesty.
The officials freed under the amnesty have been restored to their posts.
sentences.cn: 大赦中获释的原官员们已官复原职.

sentences.en: The political exiles returned home under an amnesty.
sentences.cn: 流放的政治犯根据大赦令回到家园.

sentences.en: The president granted a general amnesty for all political prisoners.
sentences.cn: 总统大赦了所有的政治犯。

sentences.en: They excepted him from the general amnesty.
sentences.cn: 他们把他排除在大赦之外.

trans.tran_en: an official order by a government that allows a particular group of prisoners to go free
